CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 13, 1954, pg. 11, reads: "1954 Debutantes - This charming group of young socialites will bow to society, Feb. 20, at Syria Mosque, in third annual AKA Debutante Cotillion. First row: Sara Everette, Beverly Frazier and Norma Nixon.  Second row: Patricia Trigg, Barbara Stout, Jacqueline Lewis, Darlene Smith, Gailya Hord and Rosetta Mills.  Third row: Paula Sullivan, Gwendolyn Brenson, Luella Blow, Herschelle Sullivan and Jacqueline Brevard."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of debutantes, first row from left: Paula Sullivan, Gwendolyn Brenson, Louella Maryonette Blow, Herschelle Sandra Sullivan, Jacqueline Eunice Brevard; second row: Patricia Trigg, Barbara Stout, Jacqueline "Jackie" Lewis [Jacqui Thompson], Darlene Smith, Gailya or Failya Marie Hord, Rosetta Yvonne Mills; third row: Sara L. Everette, Beverly Elizabeth Frazier, and Norma Leona Nixon, posed in gymnasium, another version
